title: Laurence Pearce
text:
Laurence Pearce is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> and <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He has played club level rugby league (RL) in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> for <a href="Hull%20F.C.">Hull F.C.</a> (2011–12), and as of 2017 he plays for <a href="Stade%20Montois">Mont-de-Marsan</a>, as a <a href="Back%20row%20%28rugby%20union%29">back row</a>. Laurence Pearce joined <a href="English%20Premiership%20%28rugby%20union%29">Aviva Premiership</a> club <a href="Leicester%20Tigers">Leicester Tigers</a> at the beginning of the <a href="2014%E2%80%9315%20English%20Premiership%20%28rugby%20union%29">2014/15 season</a> from <a href="RFU%20Championship">RFU Championship</a> club <a href="Rotherham%20R.U.F.C.">Rotherham Titans</a>. In early March 2016 it was announced Pearce would join <a href="Sale%20Sharks">Sale Sharks</a> from <a href="Leicester%20Tigers">Leicester Tigers</a>.
In his 2-year spell at Leicester Tigers Pearce made 28 appearances, scoring 8 tries.
